name: Ultimate Carousel
author: themescup

sections.description:
Ultimate Corusel is very simple and free to create slider in your WordPress website. You can add pictures in (PNG, JPG and GIF Even Video) posts, pages and in template files. Slider allows to add titles, descriptions and links to unlimited photos.More then 100 styles for free will be added so be updated alwayse!

Live Demo

Slider Type:

  • Video Background Sliders(Self-Hosted/Youtube/Vimeo All supported 5 style)
  • Fullwidth Slider(20 styles-Single image layer or Multi Image layer)
  • Fullwidth Slider With Services List(3 style)
  • Fullwidth Slider With Kenburn Effect(5 style)
  • Team Member Slider(5 Styles)
  • Testimonial Slider
  • Brand Slider
  • Coming Soon Slider
  • Lots of features coming soon.100% free!!!

Features

  • Powerfull Shortcodes.
  • Fully responsive and multiple layouts support.
  • Auto-start slideshow
  • Full-width, Full-screen and Boxed Layout.
  • Super smooth hardware accelerated CSS3 transitions with jQuery fallback.
  • Unlimited number of sliders.
  • Unlimited Colors.
  • Very detailed documentation with examples.
  • Unlimited variations of usage.
  • Free updates and support.
  • Option for adding a deep link to a specified slide.
  • Working in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE7-11, Opera.
  • Working in mobile browsers (Android, iOS and et.)
  • Responsive, full-width, full size or fixed dimensions layout.
  • Touch navigation on mobile browsers.
  • Keyboard navigation.
  • Option for prev / next buttons or bullets.
  • With the slider you can add for the images title and description.
  • Possibility to use different slider for different pages.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Works with any theme.

Checkout our Latest Free Multipurpose WordPress Theme

Noor – Free Responsive Multipurpose WordPress Theme

Live Demo

Tags: video slider, team slider, fulwidth slider, testimonial slider, animated multi-imahge slider.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin.

The easy way:

    Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
    Search for “Ultimate Slider”
    Click “Install”

The not so easy way:

    Upload the ml-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
    Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
    Manage your slideshows using the ‘Ultimate Slider’ menu option
